## 문제1.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{5^{-2} \times 3^3}{15^{-1}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $3^4$

풀이: $\frac{5^{-2} \times 3^3}{15^{-1}} = \frac{5^{-2} \times 3^3}{5^{-1} \times 3^{-1}} = 5^{-2 - (-1)} \times 3^{3 - (-1)} = 5^{-1} \times 3^4 = 3^4$
:::

## 문제2.

::: {.callout-note title="$\left(2^{-3} \times 4^2\right) \div 8^{-1} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{-2}$

풀이: $\left(2^{-3} \times 4^2\right) \div 8^{-1} = \frac{2^{-3} \times (2^2)^2}{2^{-3}} = \frac{2^{-3} \times 2^4}{2^{-3}} = 2^{-3 + 4 + 3} = 2^{-2}$
:::

## 문제3.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{(3^{-1})^2}{9^{-1}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $3^{-2}$

풀이: $\frac{(3^{-1})^2}{9^{-1}} = \frac{3^{-2}}{3^{-2}} = 3^{-2 + 2} = 3^{-2}$
:::

## 문제4.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{a^{-2} \times b^3}{a^3 \times b^{-2}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $a^{-5}b^5$

풀이: $\frac{a^{-2} \times b^3}{a^3 \times b^{-2}} = a^{-2 - 3} \times b^{3 - (-2)} = a^{-5}b^5$
:::

## 문제5.

::: {.callout-note title="$\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{-2} \times \frac{9^{-1}}{4^{-1}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $1$

풀이: $\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)^{-2} \times \frac{9^{-1}}{4^{-1}} = \frac{3^2}{2^2} \times \frac{4}{9} = \frac{9}{4} \times \frac{4}{9} = 1$
:::

## 문제6.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{x^{-1} \times y^{-3}}{z^2} \div x^2 y^2 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $x^{-3}y^{-5}z^{-2}$

풀이: $\frac{x^{-1} \times y^{-3}}{z^2} \div x^2 y^2 = \frac{x^{-1} \times y^{-3}}{z^2} \times x^{-2} y^{-2} = x^{-1 - 2} \times y^{-3 - 2} \times z^{-2} = x^{-3}y^{-5}z^{-2}$
:::

## 문제7.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{2^{-4} \times 3^{-3}}{6^{-2}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{-2}3^{-1}$

풀이: $\frac{2^{-4} \times 3^{-3}}{6^{-2}} = \frac{2^{-4} \times 3^{-3}}{(2 \times 3)^{-2}} = 2^{-4 - (-2)} \times 3^{-3 - (-2)} = 2^{-2} \times 3^{-1}$
:::

## 문제8.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{5^3}{5^{-2} \times 25} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $1$

풀이: $\frac{5^3}{5^{-2} \times 25} = \frac{5^3}{5^{-2} \times 5^2} = \frac{5^3}{5^0} = 1$
:::

## 문제9.

::: {.callout-note title="$10^{-3} \div \left(2^{-1} \times 5^{-2}\right) = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2 \times 5^{-1}$

풀이: $10^{-3} \div \left(2^{-1} \times 5^{-2}\right) = 10^{-3} \times 2^1 \times 5^2 = (2 \times 5)^{-3} \times 2^1 \times 5^2 = 2^{1 - 3} \times 5^{2 - 3} = 2^1 \times 5^{-1}$
:::

## 문제10.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{(a^2 b^{-3})^{-2}}{a^{-4} b^6} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $a^{-4} b^{12}$

풀이: $\frac{(a^2 b^{-3})^{-2}}{a^{-4} b^6} = \frac{a^{-4} b^6}{a^{-4} b^6} = a^{-4} b^{12}$
:::

## 문제11.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{(2^{-1} \times 3^2)^3}{6^3 \times (4^{-1})^2} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $1$

풀이: $\frac{(2^{-1} \times 3^2)^3}{6^3 \times (4^{-1})^2} = \frac{(2^{-1} \times 3^2)^3}{(2^2 \times 3)^3} = \frac{2^{-3} \times 3^6}{2^6 \times 3^3} = 2^{-3 - 6} \times 3^{6 - 3} = 2^{-9} \times 3^3 = 1$
:::

## 문제12.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{x^{-2} \times y^0}{\left(z^{-1}\right)^{-3}} \times z^{-2} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $x^{-2}z^{-5}$

풀이: $\frac{x^{-2} \times y^0}{\left(z^{-1}\right)^{-3}} \times z^{-2} = \frac{x^{-2} \times 1}{z^3} \times z^{-2} = x^{-2} \times z^{-3 - 2} = x^{-2}z^{-5}$
:::

## 문제13.

::: {.callout-note title="$\left(\frac{5^{-1} \times 2^{-3}}{10^{-2}}\right)^2 = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{-2}$

풀이: $\left(\frac{5^{-1} \times 2^{-3}}{10^{-2}}\right)^2 = \left(\frac{5^{-1} \times 2^{-3}}{5^{-2} \times 2^{-2}}\right)^2 = \left(5^{-1 - (-2)} \times 2^{-3 - (-2)}\right)^2 = \left(5^1 \times 2^{-1}\right)^2 = 5^2 \times 2^{-2} = 2^{-2}$
:::

## 문제14.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{(a^{-1} b^2)^3}{a^3 b^{-4}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $a^{-6}b^{10}$

풀이: $\frac{(a^{-1} b^2)^3}{a^3 b^{-4}} = \frac{a^{-3} \times b^6}{a^3 \times b^{-4}} = a^{-3 - 3} \times b^{6 - (-4)} = a^{-6} \times b^{10}$
:::

## 문제15.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{-3} \times 4^{-2}}{8^{-1}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $2^{-1}$

풀이: $\frac{\left(\frac{1}{2}\right)^{-3} \times 4^{-2}}{8^{-1}} = \frac{2^3 \times (2^2)^{-2}}{2^{-3}} = \frac{2^3 \times 2^{-4}}{2^{-3}} = 2^{3 - 4 + 3} = 2^{-1}$
:::

## 문제16.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{(3x^2 y^{-1})^3}{x^6 y^{-2} z^0} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $3^3y^{-1}$

풀이: $\frac{(3x^2 y^{-1})^3}{x^6 y^{-2} z^0} = \frac{3^3 \times x^6 \times y^{-3}}{x^6 \times y^{-2} \times 1} = 3^3 \times x^{6 - 6} \times y^{-3 - (-2)} = 3^3 \times y^{-1}$
:::

## 문제17.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{2^{-3} \times 3^3}{6^{-2} \times (4^{-1})^2} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $3^5$

풀이: $\frac{2^{-3} \times 3^3}{6^{-2} \times (4^{-1})^2} = \frac{2^{-3} \times 3^3}{2^{-2} \times 3^{-2} \times 2^{-2}} = 2^{-3 - (-2) - (-2)} \times 3^{3 - (-2)} = 2^1 \times 3^5 = 3^5$
:::

## 문제18.

::: {.callout-note title="$\left(\frac{1}{x^{-3} y^2}\right) \div x^4 y^{-5} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $x^{-7}y^{7}$

풀이: $\left(\frac{1}{x^{-3} y^2}\right) \div x^4 y^{-5} = x^3 y^{-2} \div x^4 y^{-5} = x^{3 - 4} \times y^{-2 - (-5)} = x^{-7} \times y^{7}$
:::

## 문제19.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{(a^{-2} b^3)^2}{(a b^{-1})^4} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $a^{-8}b^{14}$

풀이: $\frac{(a^{-2} b^3)^2}{(a b^{-1})^4} = \frac{a^{-4} b^6}{a^4 b^{-4}} = a^{-4 - 4} \times b^{6 - (-4)} = a^{-8} \times b^{14}$
:::

## 문제20.

::: {.callout-note title="$\frac{5^{-3} \times 2^{-2}}{\left(10^{-1}\right)^3 \div 2^{-1}} = ?$" collapse="true" appearance="minimal"}
답= $1$

풀이: $\frac{5^{-3} \times 2^{-2}}{\left(10^{-1}\right)^3 \div 2^{-1}} = \frac{5^{-3} \times 2^{-2}}{10^{-3} \times 2^1} = \frac{5^{-3} \times 2^{-2}}{(2 \times 5)^{-3} \times 2^1} = 5^{-3 - (-3)} \times 2^{-2 - (-3) - 1} = 5^0 \times 2^0 = 1$
:::
